title: Google Summer of Code - Selected Contributor
description: Selected as a GSoC contributor for the TensorFlow project, implementing new visualization tools for model debugging and analysis.

title: 1st Place - University Hackathon
description: Won first place among 150+ teams with 'EcoTrack', an AI-powered sustainability tracking app that helps users reduce their carbon footprint.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
description: Earned the AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification, demonstrating expertise in designing distributed systems on AWS infrastructure.

title: Dean's List - Academic Excellence
description: Recognized for maintaining a GPA above 3.8 while actively contributing to research projects and extracurricular activities.

title: Adobe Creative Jam - Runner Up
description: Placed second in the Adobe Creative Jam design competition for creating an innovative UI concept for accessible educational platforms.
